entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:04 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 5:35 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 10.3°C
Wind: SSW 26 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 20 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
